title: Assess Risk of a Labor Strike
description: News reports indicate a potential labor strike by local union electricians. A PM must assess the risk to the project.

tasks.description: Identify all upcoming tasks assigned to the electrical subcontractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of all electrical tasks for the next 60 days is generated.

tasks.description: Log the potential strike in the risk register, classifying it as 'High Impact, Low Probability'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new entry is created in the risk register.

tasks.description: As a contingency, identify a non-union electrical subcontractor that could be used if the strike occurs.
